release_notes.en-US: Just a version increment to support firefox 3.6

description.en-US:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
THIS EXTENSION IS NO LONGER UNDER DEVELOPMENT. 

Unfortunately I just do not have the time to work on this extension. The version bumps are just to support the existing users.  

 If I continue to receive bad reviews because I do not have time to update, I will just remove the extension completely as poor ratings due to my lack of time affects my real life employment opportunites.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The text complete extension adds shortcuts and auto complete functionality to text fields within web forms, the thunderbird message composer, and various other fields within the firefox browser and thunderbird messagecomposer.   

The available shortcuts can be defined through extension options. Shortcuts can be shared through a central xml file stored on a web server or a network share. 

Text complete was built to ease the typing required by support staff entering standard responses into a web based support system.

It is also useful for any information that is often entered into form fields such as email addresses, phone numbers, or to just quickly add a signature to the end of a forum post.

developer_comments.en-US:
Testing the Installation:

1)Open up a web page with a form eg. Google.com
2)Type firefox into a text field
3)press the trigger key. Default: CTRL + ALT + m

For Thunderbird open the message composer instead of a webpage. ;)

If the extension is installed correctly the word firefox will be replaced by some other text.
